participant_1.background:
I will miss my parents a lot since they moved to Florida.
I love the sound of a classic car engine, it's like music to my ears.
I like to have a place where I can fully immerse myself in my fantasy world.
i would like to try sky diving.
i dropped out of college.

participant_2.background:
I spend my free time with my new love, whom I love to drive around with on long winding roads.
I started writing and recording blues music in my spare time.
i do not like pickles.
i am blind.
i am from tennessee.

content.text: Hi there! How are you doing today?
I am doing well! Just moved to a new place and I am learning blues music!
That is awesome! I just dropped out of college and I am missing my parents.
Aw that is tough. What are you going to do now?
I am not sure yet. I am thinking about taking some time off and going skydiving!
That sounds amazing! I would love to go skydiving but I am blind.
That is okay! You can always watch me do it!
I would love that! I am excited to see you do that!
I am excited to do it! Do you have any other hobbies besides music?
I love to drive around with my new love on long winding roads.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love driving in the country.
Me too! I love the open roads and the fresh air.
I am from Tennessee too! Where are you from?
I am from Tennessee! I am moving to Nashville soon.
That is awesome! I love Nashville!
Me too! I am excited to move there.
I am excited for you! I am sure you will love it there!
Thanks! I am sure I will too
